channel.title: Asides on Deuts Log
channel.description: Recent content in Asides on Deuts Log

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JKAW6PMRHHG8VB5QA06ZAJMX
item.description:
💰 Ever tried processing payments on a holiday? Yeah, banks just laugh at you. 🤡 I wrote a Power Query function that skips weekends and holidays to get the next banking day—because money waits for no one (except financial institutions).

Check it out: deuts.org/∞

#PowerQuery #Mlanguage #FinancialTech #DataScience

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3lhgfuz6n3k2v
item.description:
🚀 Need to make sure your financial reports don’t land on a weekend? I just wrote about a Power Query function that finds the next banking day—because banks don’t care about your deadlines, but your spreadsheets should. 💸📊

Read more: deuts.org/∞

#PowerQuery #Finance #DataNerd

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JK9XWEWNKPQNPM322XSCXJZA
item.description:
🚀 Python and Power Query both love data, but they speak very different dialects.
🔹 Python: Lists & Dicts
🔸 Power Query: Lists & Records
Mix them up, and you might end up debugging all day. 🫠
Let’s dissect the differences before they dissect your workflow! 🧵👇
deuts.org/∞
item.content:encoded:

item.title: @deuts.hamili.net 3lhfigy37ak2m
item.description:
💡 Python vs. Power Query: The ultimate data duel! 🥊 Lists vs. Lists? ✅
Dictionaries vs. Records? ✅
Same thing, right? Well… not quite. 👀
Let’s break it down so you don’t get caught mixing apples and data frames! 🍏📊
deuts.org/∞

item.title: @deuts@deuts.one 01JK07EJ3C68Y1R2E4CKDH43H7
item.description: Didn’t know that #Memos by #UseMemos have a third party Android app! Now more reason for me to use it for my notes. Wish it had AI supported search, though, ala #Blinko mudkipme/MoeMemosAndroid: An app to help you capture thoughts and ideas github.com/∞
item.content:encoded: Didn’t know that #Memos by #UseMemos have a third party Android app! Now more reason for me to use it for my notes. Wish it had AI supported search, though, ala #Blinko mudkipme/MoeMemosAndroid: An app to help you capture thoughts and ideas github.com/∞

item.title: DumbWareio - DumbDrop: dumb file dropper
item.description:
DumbWareio - DumbDrop: dumb file dropper

A stupid simple file upload application that provides a clean, modern interface for dragging and dropping files. Built with Node.js and vanilla JavaScript.
This could be useful for our Python app, to process CSV/Excel files and send out the output probably via email. I just wish there was a way to change the name DumbDrop right at the dead center.
item.content:encoded:
DumbWareio - DumbDrop: dumb file dropper

A stupid simple file upload application that provides a clean, modern interface for dragging and dropping files. Built with Node.js and vanilla JavaScript.
This could be useful for our Python app, to process CSV/Excel files and send out the output probably via email. I just wish there was a way to change the name DumbDrop right at the dead center.

item.title: TinyAuth
item.description:
TinyAuth

The simplest way to protect your apps with a login screen. - steveiliop56/tinyauth

Another authentik and authelia alternative. Hopefully it lives up to its name - - tiny!

Update: I’ll wait for this app to mature before implementing to my services. As the note in their Github page goes:

Tinyauth is intended for homelab use and it is not made for production use cases. If you are looking for something production ready please use authentik.
item.content:encoded:
TinyAuth

The simplest way to protect your apps with a login screen. - steveiliop56/tinyauth

Another authentik and authelia alternative. Hopefully it lives up to its name - - tiny!

Update: I’ll wait for this app to mature before implementing to my services. As the note in their Github page goes:

Tinyauth is intended for homelab use and it is not made for production use cases. If you are looking for something production ready please use authentik.

item.title: Pocket ID
item.description:
Pocket ID

Pocket ID is a simple OIDC provider that allows users to authenticate with their passkeys to your services.
Authentik and authelia alternative.
item.content:encoded:
Pocket ID

Pocket ID is a simple OIDC provider that allows users to authenticate with their passkeys to your services.
Authentik and authelia alternative.

item.title: DumbWare.io - Stupid Simple Software
item.description:
DumbWare.io - Stupid Simple Software

We make sophisticated problems stupid simple. Our software is like a michelin star restaurant serving chicken nuggets - sophisticatedly Simple.
Stupidly simple selfhosted apps we can explore and deploy anytime.
